name: Dark Momentos
description:
Dark Momentos is a PS1 styled Horror game in which you have to collect momentos located throughout various locations in nuclear Russia. We created this game in under 48 hours for the Farset labs Global Game Jam.

Aryn McDowell (@SpoopyValeren) - Programming / UI
Stuart Winton (@SpookySketches) - Modelling / Level Design
Blake Swift (@ShadyVox) - Music

PS1 effect was achieved with the help of a premade post process for Unreal Engine 4 (Link to github page).
